drivers: AI hype cooling - monetization taking longer than expected
Enterprise spending cautious - CFOs tightening budgets
Rates still elevated - hurting growth stocks
DeepSeek shock - cheaper AI models = less infrastructure spend
market_context.strategy: Be selective. Only buy profitable companies with strong FCF. Avoid debt-fueled growth bets.

munger_200w_plays.name: Adobe Inc.
munger_200w_plays.thesis: Quality company at deep discount - AI fears overdone. PROFITABLE with strong FCF.
munger_200w_plays.notes: Cleanest software play. Actually profitable, not burning cash. 16x P/E is historically cheap. FCF positive. Debt manageable.

watch_for_entry.name: Salesforce Inc.
watch_for_entry.thesis: Enterprise AI leader - good fundamentals but software sentiment could drag lower
watch_for_entry.notes: Strong FCF but sentiment could push it lower. Wait for $175 level or sentiment turn.

watch_for_entry.name: Walt Disney Co.
watch_for_entry.notes: Not software - different risk profile. Parks strong, streaming improving.

watch_for_entry.name: Nike Inc.
watch_for_entry.thesis: Turnaround in progress - new CEO cleanup
watch_for_entry.notes: Turnaround not proven. High P/E for no growth. Consumer discretionary risk.

avoid.name: Oracle Corporation
avoid.reason: Debt-fueled AI infrastructure bet. $130B debt, NEGATIVE $10B FCF. Not a Munger play.
avoid.notes: Leveraged bet on AI data centers. If AI spend slows, this gets ugly. Could see $120.

avoid.name: PayPal Holdings
avoid.reason: Value trap - losing share to Apple Pay, BNPL. Only 3.7% growth.

avoid.name: Target Corporation
avoid.reason: Revenue declining (-1.6%). Analysts have target BELOW current price.

alerts.note: Strong buy zone - back up the truck
